fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Subpeona a player each night, learning their role and win condition.
- Once per game, call Court during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your Subpoena result is immune to anything that can fool it.
- During Court, all voting is anonymous, and anyone voted up will be immediately executed. All messages you send appear as the Court, and all other player chats appear as the Jury. Whispering is disabled during Court.
- You have three votes while Court is active.
- **Ethereal Defense** - Your defense only applies to Evil and Neutral factions. Good faction roles ignore your defense, unless you gain defense by other means.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
